    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"

>
[Stone Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=4380) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #195: Heavy is the Crown](/Sources.aspx?ID=210) pg. 83

**Archetype** [Stonebound](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=210)

**Prerequisites**
[Stonebound Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4377)

</column>

---

Your blood becomes thick and sluggish, but no less effective at oxygenating your cells. You can selectively stop your bleeding with ease. Reduce the DC of flat checks to stop [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) from 15 to 10, and you can use a single action that has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait to gain an early flat check without physically binding the wounds. You recover from the [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) condition twice as quickly as normal.
